As you see we have made ambitious plans, and even if they
materialize only in part, I think we will still have some¬
thing very worthwhile and hope you will want to participate
in the venture.
Will you let us hear from you on this at your earliest con¬
venience. If you do not think the length indicated is suf¬
ficient for a treatment of your pro argument, please advise
me; also please let me know if you think there are any pos¬
sibilities for illustration.
Thank you very much for your consideration of this request.
Sincerely yours,
AUDIO-VISUAL INSTRUCTION
Alice Finstad
Editorial Assistant
